text: "Stop Your Sobbing" is a 1964 song by The Kinks and taken from their debut studio album Kinks. ==The Pretenders version== In 1979, British band The Pretenders covered Stop Your Sobbing as their debut single from their debut studio album Pretenders. It went to number 34 in the United Kingdom and number 65 in the United States. ==References== Category:1964 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:The Pretenders songs
title: Stop Your Sobbing
